overview: Young, sweet and almost innocent, eighteen year old Kyle heard that we were going to Portland Oregon (PDX) to shoot another jizzfest. He told us that he had never been to a bathhouse or even a gay bar before. You see him go pig wild at the baths, and he goes out to a gay bar and strips for the horny crowd! This video should have been called 'Kyle gives you a puppy-dog look and gets whatever he wants'... but that would have been too fucking long.
title: Portland Cum: Kyle's First Time
